synopsis.text: It's not every day that a typical high school student like Makoto Konno stumbles upon the extraordinary ability to leap back in time. Amidst the usual high school pressures and carefree moments with her best friends, Chiaki and Kousuke, Makoto's life takes an unexpected turn with this newfound power. Initially, she uses her ability to ace exams, avoid mishaps, and alter minor events. However, Makoto soon learns that tampering with time is a double-edged sword, as seemingly insignificant changes can lead to complex and sometimes dire consequences for herself and those around her. As she grapples with the intricacies of time, Makoto discovers that her once-coveted power comes with a heavy burden. Join Makoto as she navigates the complexities of time manipulation in this engaging and thought-provoking anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
